notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, N.M. and E.F.-C.; methodology, M.K. (Michel Koropogui), B.S., I.K. and J.H.; software, E.F.-C.; validation, S.D. and E.F.-C.; formal analysis, E.F.-C.; investigation, N.M., E.K., S.C., M.K. (Moussa Kone) and S.K.; data curation, N.M., M.K. (Michel Koropogui) and E.F.-C.; writing—original draft preparation, N.M.; writing—review and editing, N.M., S.D. and E.F.-C.; visualization, E.F.-C.; supervision, N.M., S.G., S.K., S.D. and E.F.-C.; project administration, N.M., S.G., S.D., S.K. and E.F.-C.; funding acquisition, N.M., S.G., S.K. and E.F.-C. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
